Name: Dr. Vincent Calamia, New York City Health and Hospitals Corporation
Title: Resolution designating Dr. Vincent Calamia, a resident of Staten Island, for appointment by the Mayor as a director of the New York City Health and Hospitals Corporation
BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council

Text: RESOLVED, Pursuant to Section 4 of the New York City Health and Hospitals Act (Chapter 1016 of the Laws of 1969), the Council approves the designation of Dr. Vincent Calamia, a resident of Staten Island, for appointment by the Mayor to serve as a director of the New York City Health and Hospitals Corporation for the remainder of a five-year term that will expire on March 20, 2026.
